longdescription.p: This page contains information about the gse (Gentoo Support Everywhere) project, whose aim is to offer support for Gentoo in external sites, like LinuxQuestions.org

body.p: This project is born as a way to offer some kind of support otside the Gentoo official sites, more concretely, it started as a way to offer support at the LinuxQuestions forums. However the plan is to extend this support to any other place when needed.
As a part of this support, we also maintain relationships with the administration and moderation teams of these external site(s).

ul.li: LinuxQuestions forums: all the paperwork is done, and we are already supporting this site.

extrachapter.title: Sites we are working with to offer support
